## The Data

**World Bank Worldwide Governance Indicators + Business Ready Project**

- 6 governance dimensions (Government Effectiveness, Rule of Law, etc.)
- 3 regulatory performance pillars (Framework, Services, Efficiency)
- 200+ countries
- Multiple outcome indicators (GDP, life expectancy, literacy, etc.)

## What We Built

An interactive explorer combining:

1. **Data table** with inline visualizations
2. **D3.js visualizations** - Regulatory Framework vs Public Services
3. **Custom explorer** - any metric vs any metric, colored by region or income

All client-side, real-time, responsive.
